entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 1700 metres rising to 2000 metres this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Snow level 2000 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 2100 metres rising to 2400 metres late in the afternoon.
